aims to improve.from sentence: This paper aims to improve existing document embedding models by training document embeddings using cosine similarity instead of dot product .

trying to.from sentence: For example , in the basic model of trying to predict given a document - the words / n - grams in the document , instead of trying to maximize the dot product between a document vector and vectors of the words / n - grams in the document over the training set , we 'll be trying to maximize the cosine similarity instead .
